mapper.select: select a.mno, c.gr_nm as gr_nm, sum(pnt) as pnt from mv_mv_anly a inner join mv_mv_gr b on a.mvno = b.mvno inner join mv_gr c on c.grno= b.grno inner join mv_mv d on d.mvno = a.mvno where a.mno =#{mno} GROUP by gr_nm order by pnt desc
select c.grno as grno , d.gr_nm as gr_nm, titl from mv_mv a , mv_mv_anly b inner join mv_mv_gr c on c.mvno = b.mvno inner join mv_gr d on c.grno = d.grno where a.mvno = b.mvno and b.mno = #{mno}
